function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning and handling of the ionizers leading to potential contamination","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to ineffective ionizers","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training on proper handling and cleaning of ionizers","Technologies":"Improved ESCS ionizers with fewer needles and increased range","People":"Healthcare workers, facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of testing with artificial aerosols to evaluate airflow patterns and particle loss between ward and roof","Impact":"Uncertainty about airflow patterns and potential particle loss in the facility","Mitigation":"Conduct testing with artificial aerosols to evaluate airflow patterns and particle loss","Technologies":"Airflow testing equipment, artificial aerosol generators","People":"Facility management, ventilation system technicians","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Potential differences in ionizer effect on TB transmission between ward and animal facility","Impact":"Inconsistent ionizer effect on disease transmission in different areas of the facility","Mitigation":"Conduct specific studies to evaluate ionizer effect in different areas of the facility","Technologies":"Ionizer effect evaluation studies, environmental monitoring equipment","People":"Healthcare workers, facility management","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
